item.title: Breaking down the two cultures: why Imperial needs to embrace the arts
item.author: Sonny Coduri-Fulfort,
item.description: Before I started at Imperial, I was bracing myself for something more than the regular anxieties expected with coming to a new University. I had heard a lot about what to anticipate: a deprecation of any subject which is not ‘hard-core science’, confrontation because someone enjoys taking part in …
